original: @111a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @111a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i gu hy'a rtha pra k'a sa ma h'a a'adbh'u ta n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i gu hy'a rtha pra k'a sa ma h'a a'adbh'u ta n'a ma /
translated: ≈örƒ´-guhyƒÅrtha-prakƒÅ≈õa-mahƒÅdƒÅ-nƒÅma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal zab mo'i don gsal ba rmad du byung ba chen po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal zab mo'i don gsal ba rmad du byung ba chen po zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious elucidation of the profound meaning, the great marvel

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid mgon //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid mgon //
translated: The lord of the nature of the great seal,

original: rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid dngos //
analyzed: rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid dngos //
translated: The actual characteristic of self-awareness,

original: spros pa med pa sku dang bral //
analyzed: spros pa med pa sku dang bral //
translated: Free from elaboration, devoid of form,

original: ye shes nam mkha' rang bzhin 'dud //
analyzed: ye shes nam mkha' rang bzhin 'dud //
translated: I bow to the space of wisdom, the nature.

original: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla ma dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi mchog gi nang nas /
analyzed: bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla ma dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi mchog gi nang nas /
translated: Among the tantras of action, conduct, yoga, highest yoga, and unsurpassed yoga,

original: de rang phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
analyzed: de rang phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
translated: In the king of tantras, the Drop of the Great Seal,

original: gang zhig dpal bla mas slob ma la bshad pa bdag la gnang ba de rang don /
analyzed: gang zhig dpal bla mas slob ma la bshad pa bdag la gnang ba de rang don /
translated: The glorious guru explained to me what was granted to me, that very meaning.

original: phyi nas rnal 'byor ma'i lung las 'dun pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i ngag gi dbang gis rdo rje spun dang lhan cig 'brel gtam bgyid pa'i phyir bdag 'dri zhes thos so //
analyzed: phyi nas rnal 'byor ma'i lung las 'dun pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i ngag gi dbang gis rdo rje spun dang lhan cig 'brel gtam bgyid pa'i phyir bdag 'dri zhes thos so //
translated: Later, from the oral transmission of the Yoginƒ´, he heard, Ask me, in order to engage in conversation with the vajra siblings by the power of speech that is free from characteristics and intention.

original: de ni ji ltar bla mas gtan la phab pa'i rim pa rnam par dpyad de /
analyzed: de ni ji ltar bla mas gtan la phab pa'i rim pa rnam par dpyad de /
translated: That is to be analyzed according to the stages determined by the guru.

original: dang po re zhig brjod pa la sogs pa lnga bshad de /
analyzed: dang po re zhig brjod pa la sogs pa lnga bshad de /
translated: First, the five topics such as expression are explained.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: des ni rgyud la mdor bstan pa dang / rgyas par bstan pa dang / so sor bstan pa dang / ye shes dang ye shes las byung ba'i don kun shes so //
analyzed: des ni rgyud la mdor bstan pa dang / rgyas par bstan pa dang / so sor bstan pa dang / ye shes dang ye shes las byung ba'i don kun shes so //
translated: Because by that, one understands all the meanings of the tantra, which are taught in brief, in extensive [form], individually, and the meaning of the gnosis and the gnosis arisen from that.

original: de'i phyir brjod pa la sogs pa lnga 'dri ba legs /
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod pa la sogs pa lnga 'dri ba legs /
translated: Therefore, it is good to ask about the five topics such as expression.

original: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The stages of that are as follows:

original: brjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang / 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang / 'brel pa dang / dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
translated: expression, the expressed, the connection, the purpose, and the ultimate purpose.

original: de ru cha dang thig le la sogs pa'i bdag nyid sbyor ba drug gi rnam par shes pa man chad lnga bcu rtsa bzhi 'bri ba gang zhig dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mtshan zhes bya ba'i mthar yan chad brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de ru cha dang thig le la sogs pa'i bdag nyid sbyor ba drug gi rnam par shes pa man chad lnga bcu rtsa bzhi 'bri ba gang zhig dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mtshan zhes bya ba'i mthar yan chad brjod pa'o //
translated: There, the fifty-four consciousnesses of the six yogas, which have the nature of parts, bindus, and so on, are written down, and the name of the glorious dakini of Timeless Awareness is written at the end.

original: de ni dpal phyag rgya @111b chen po'i thig le rje btsun smra ba de ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni dpal phyag rgya @111b chen po'i thig le rje btsun smra ba de ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: That is the glorious Drop of the Great Seal, which the venerable one should speak.

original: de dag rjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba gnyis gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag rjod pa dang / brjod par bya ba gnyis gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i phyir /
translated: Since those two, the one who speaks and the one who is spoken to, are of the nature of nonduality,

original: shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid kyis 'dul ba'i don gzigs nas gang zhig gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa sbyin pa yang blang ba de ni dgos pa /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid kyis 'dul ba'i don gzigs nas gang zhig gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa sbyin pa yang blang ba de ni dgos pa /
translated: having seen the meaning of the discipline of the suchness of nondual wisdom and method, the one who grants the secret empowerment and so on is the purpose.

original: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thob pa'i phyi nas gang zhig 'bras bu rnyed pa de ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thob pa'i phyi nas gang zhig 'bras bu rnyed pa de ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the result after obtaining the empowerment and so on is the purpose of the purpose.

original: 'bras bu'i sgras ni sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i sgras ni sangs rgyas nyid //
translated: The result is buddhahood.

original: yang na rdo rje ni rgyud kyi don rgyas par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje ni rgyud kyi don rgyas par bstan pa'o //
translated: Or else, the vajra is the extensive explanation of the meaning of the tantra.

original: gang zhig 'brel pa de can 'dri /
analyzed: gang zhig 'brel pa de can 'dri /
translated: That which is related is asked about.

original: gang zhig brjod par bya ba de ni rgyud kyi mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig brjod par bya ba de ni rgyud kyi mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: That which is to be expressed is the brief explanation of the tantra.

original: gang zhig brjod par bya ba de ni rgyud kyi don rgyas par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig brjod par bya ba de ni rgyud kyi don rgyas par bstan pa'o //
translated: That which is expressed is the extensive explanation of the meaning of the tantra.

original: gang zhig 'brel pa de ni gsang ba'i dbang la sogs pa so sor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'brel pa de ni gsang ba'i dbang la sogs pa so sor bstan pa'o //
translated: That which is related is the individual explanations of the secret initiation, and so forth.

original: gang zhig dgos pa de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gang zhig dgos pa de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur pa'i ye shes so //
translated: That which is the purpose is the gnosis of the wisdom initiation.

original: gang zhig dgos pa'i dgos pa de ni bzhi pa'i don gyi man ngag gi ye shes las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig dgos pa'i dgos pa de ni bzhi pa'i don gyi man ngag gi ye shes las byung ba'o //
translated: That which is the purpose of the purpose is the arising of the gnosis of the intimate instruction of the meaning of the fourth.

original: ye shes las byung ba'i sgras ni ye shes thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes las byung ba'i sgras ni ye shes thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term ‚Äúarising from gnosis‚Äù means the comprehension of all gnoses.

original: de ni slob dpon gyi gzhung ngo //
analyzed: de ni slob dpon gyi gzhung ngo //
translated: This is the treatise of the master.

original: sdud pa po'i gzhung gis 'di ru brjod pa ni mdor bstan pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: sdud pa po'i gzhung gis 'di ru brjod pa ni mdor bstan pa'i rgyud do //
translated: The treatise of the compiler is the brief explanation of the tantra.

original: brjod par bya ba ni rgyas par bstan pa'i phyag dang zhal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ni rgyas par bstan pa'i phyag dang zhal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The subject matter is endowed with the extensive teaching of the hands, faces, and so on.

original: 'brel pa ni so sor bstan pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni so sor bstan pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor ro //
translated: The connection is the retinue of dakinis taught individually.

original: dgos pa'i ye shes ni 'dod chags kyis 'dul ba rnams la shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pas tha mal pa'i 'dod chags 'jig pa'o //üîΩdgos pa'i dgos pa ye shes las byung ba ni grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i bde ba dang mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'tsho ba la /
analyzed: dgos pa'i ye shes ni 'dod chags kyis 'dul ba rnams la shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pas tha mal pa'i 'dod chags 'jig pa'o // dgos pa'i dgos pa ye shes las byung ba ni grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i bde ba dang mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'tsho ba la /
translated: The purpose is the wisdom that is the antidote for those to be tamed by desire, since method and wisdom are nondual, ordinary desire is destroyed.

original: bde ba chen po'i gnas su sleb pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gnas su sleb pa'o //
translated: The purpose of the purpose is the arising of wisdom, since the life of those who have the illness of happiness and suffering in the countless worlds is brought to the state of great bliss.

original: de ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas sdud pa po'i gzhung bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas sdud pa po'i gzhung bshad pa'o //
translated: That is the explanation of the text of the compiler by the master's own mouth.

original: zhu ba po yang de ru 'di skad smra'o //
analyzed: zhu ba po yang de ru 'di skad smra'o //
translated: The questioner also says this:

original: rgyud la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa med pas sdud pa po'i gzhung ji ltar yin /
analyzed: rgyud la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa med pas sdud pa po'i gzhung ji ltar yin /

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bka' stsal pa /

original: 'bum lnga'i bdag nyid /
analyzed: 'bum lnga'i bdag nyid /
translated: The tantra is the essence of the five hundred thousand.

original: kye'i rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa nye bar bstan pa gsungs so //üîΩde'i dus su gzhan ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi dbus su rtsa ba'i don @112a * //
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa nye bar bstan pa gsungs so // de'i dus su gzhan ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi dbus su rtsa ba'i don @112a * //
translated: In the Hevajra Root Tantra, the words ‚Äúthus have I heard‚Äù and so forth are taught.

original: gyi rgyud thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i gzhung gi gsang ba chen po'i don de ma thag tu rgyas btab pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gyi rgyud thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i gzhung gi gsang ba chen po'i don de ma thag tu rgyas btab pa'i phyir //
translated: At that time, in the center of the retinue that is not other, all the root tantras are sealed immediately with the meaning of the great secret of the Yoginƒ´ Tantra.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i thig le phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba'i gsang ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyud las gsungs so //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i thig le phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba'i gsang ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyud las gsungs so //
translated: It is taught in the Secret Ocean Tantra called the Later Tantra of the Drop of the Great Seal.

original: phyi ma zhes bya ba ni sngar phyung ba ste /
analyzed: phyi ma zhes bya ba ni sngar phyung ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú Later‚Äù means previously extracted.

original: dpal sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor de kho na nyid bstan pa las de skad gsungs so //
analyzed: dpal sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor de kho na nyid bstan pa las de skad gsungs so //
translated: It is taught in the ≈örƒ´ Buddha-Yoga Tattva-Upade≈õa.

original: de'i phyir sdud pa pos 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa ma smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sdud pa pos 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa ma smos so //
translated: Therefore, the compiler does not mention ‚Äúthus have I heard‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'on kyang rtsa ba dang / brtag pa la sogs pa rgyud kun sdud pa po'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtsa ba dang / brtag pa la sogs pa rgyud kun sdud pa po'i tshig yin no //
translated: However, the words of the compiler of all the tantras, such as the Root Tantra, the Analysis, and so forth, are as follows.

original: gang gi phyir zha na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zha na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni lha dang mi la sogs pas rnyed par dka' ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni lha dang mi la sogs pas rnyed par dka' ba de'i phyir /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva is difficult to attain by gods, humans, and so on. Therefore,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas sdud pa pos nyan te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas sdud pa pos nyan te /
translated: the BhagavƒÅn spoke from his mouth, and the compiler listened.

original: lha dang mi la sogs pa la gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: lha dang mi la sogs pa la gsal bar byas so //
translated: He clarified it for gods, humans, and so on.

original: de bzhin du sdud pa po rang gis smras pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sdud pa po rang gis smras pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, it is not said by the compiler himself.

original: sdud pa po ni 'dir yang /
analyzed: sdud pa po ni 'dir yang /
translated: The compiler here

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sprul pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sprul pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: is an emanation of Vajradhara, a bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who is a lord of the tenth stage.

original: bcom ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro la //
analyzed: bcom ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro la //
translated: To the BhagavƒÅn, the dakini of wisdom,

original: zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zhu ba gson zhes /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zhu ba gson zhes /
translated: means Listen to my request, O BhagavƒÅn.

original: de skad bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'og tu 'chad pa'i sbyor ba drug gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa don zhu ba'i phyir khod du chud par mdzad ces lung ngo //
analyzed: de skad bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'og tu 'chad pa'i sbyor ba drug gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa don zhu ba'i phyir khod du chud par mdzad ces lung ngo //
translated: Thus, below, he says, In order to request the meaning of the six yogas, such as the consciousness and so on, he made a request to the BhagavƒÅn, the glorious Great Vajradhara.

original: slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung gis 'di ru don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung gis 'di ru don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning here is according to the treatise of another master.

original: bha ga yod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bha ga yod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is so called because he has a bhaga.

original: bha ga'i sgra ni yang dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gang la yod pa de ni ye shes mkha' 'gro nyi ma'o //
analyzed: bha ga'i sgra ni yang dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gang la yod pa de ni ye shes mkha' 'gro nyi ma'o //
translated: The term bhaga is explained in the commentary as the gnosis of the perfect expanse of reality. The one who has the light rays of that gnosis is the dakini of gnosis, the sun.

original: slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung gis dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung gis dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn is so called because he possesses the six qualities of ƒ™≈õvara and so on, according to the treatise of other masters.

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro zhes bshad do //
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro zhes bshad do //
translated: He is called a sky-goer because he moves in the sky.üîΩ Moving in the sky is explained as meaning

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba yang don /
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba yang don /
translated: the sky-goer is the one who moves in the sky.

original: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis 'di skad bshad de /
analyzed: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis 'di skad bshad de /
translated: This is explained according to the treatise of ≈örƒ´ Indrabh≈´ti.

original: glo bur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa rang gis ngo bo'i sku rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: glo bur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa rang gis ngo bo'i sku rgyal ba'o //
translated: The victor is the kƒÅya that is the essence of oneself, the vajra-holder who is the nature of the adventitious bodhicitta.

original: gsang ba'i snying pad rgyas par byed //
analyzed: gsang ba'i snying pad rgyas par byed //
translated: The one who opens the lotus of the secret essence

original: ces bya ba la /üîΩgsang ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba la / gsang ba ni /
translated: is so called because

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam par sbyor ba zhes lung las bshad pa'o //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam par sbyor ba zhes lung las bshad pa'o //
translated: the secret is explained in the scriptures as the union of ƒÅlikƒÅli.

original: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis gsang ba ni chos kyi @112b 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis gsang ba ni chos kyi @112b 'byung gnas so //
translated: The other masters' texts say that the secret is the source of phenomena.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis /
translated: The Vajra Master's text says:

original: 'dab ma gsum pa'i rnam pa reg bya'i rtsa'i chu skyes so //
analyzed: 'dab ma gsum pa'i rnam pa reg bya'i rtsa'i chu skyes so //
translated: The lotus of the tactile-faculty channel with a three-petaled form.

original: snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The essence is the bodhicitta.

original: padma zhes bya ba ni kun du dmar ba'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba ni kun du dmar ba'i rang bzhin /
translated: The lotus is the nature of universal redness.

original: rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba ni gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: The one who causes it to open is the one who causes it to be clear.

original: yang na 'byung bar mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang na 'byung bar mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Or the meaning is that it is the one who causes it to arise.

original: gsang bar lte ba'i nang na gnas //
analyzed: gsang bar lte ba'i nang na gnas //
translated: The secret is located inside the navel.

original: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon badzra bo dhis gsungs pa'i a'a li k'a li gnyis su med par sbyor ba mngon sum du rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i dngos po de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon badzra bo dhis gsungs pa'i a'a li k'a li gnyis su med par sbyor ba mngon sum du rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i dngos po de /
translated: This is the direct perception of the union of the nondual Alikali taught by Master Vajrabodhi.

original: 'di ru chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi gzhal yas khang gi nang du bzhugs so //
analyzed: 'di ru chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi gzhal yas khang gi nang du bzhugs so //
translated: The entity of the Great Vajra Holder resides here in the celestial mansion of the source of phenomena.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis /
translated: The Vajra Master's text says:

original: gsang ba ni mchog gi dga' ba /
analyzed: gsang ba ni mchog gi dga' ba /
translated: The secret is supreme joy.

original: padma ni chad pa'i dga' ba /
analyzed: padma ni chad pa'i dga' ba /
translated: The lotus is the joy of cessation.

original: lte ba ni rang bzhin gyi dga' ba /
analyzed: lte ba ni rang bzhin gyi dga' ba /
translated: The navel is the joy of the nature.

original: de lta bu'i dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid /
analyzed: de lta bu'i dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid /
translated: The nature of those three joys is

original: dga' ba gnyis kyi dbus su glo bur ba'i rang bzhin padma'i 'dab mar chu bzhin du bzhugs so //
analyzed: dga' ba gnyis kyi dbus su glo bur ba'i rang bzhin padma'i 'dab mar chu bzhin du bzhugs so //
translated: in the middle of the two joys, like water on a lotus leaf.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / 'di ru gsang ba'i rgya mtsho las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di ru gsang ba'i rgya mtsho las //
translated: In the ocean of the secret here,

original: mchog dang chad pa'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: mchog dang chad pa'i dbus su ni //

analyzed: yang na skyor ba bzhi zhes bya ba ni don ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Or, four repetitions means just the meaning.

original: dbang bskur ba ni chags pa la sogs kyi dri ma dag par byed pa /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni chags pa la sogs kyi dri ma dag par byed pa /
translated: Consecration is the purification of the stains of passion, etc.

original: 'bras bu'i dus su gsum du dbye ba zhes bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'bras kyi skabs su dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus su gsum du dbye ba zhes bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'bras kyi skabs su dpyad par bya'o //
translated: The explanation of the division into three at the time of the result should be analyzed in the context of cause and effect.

original: slob dpon la sogs bya ba la /
analyzed: slob dpon la sogs bya ba la /
translated: In the performance of the master and so forth,

original: don ni ji ltar bshad de chu dang / dbu rgyan la sogs pas dbang bcu gcig gi dbang phyug sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don ni ji ltar bshad de chu dang / dbu rgyan la sogs pas dbang bcu gcig gi dbang phyug sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is explained as water, crown, and so on, the lord of the eleven empowerments, the body of the Buddha Vajradhara.

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
translated: The secret is the enjoyment body.

original: shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku /
analyzed: shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku /
translated: The wisdom-knowledge is the truth body.

original: bzhi pa ni bde ba chen po'i sku //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni bde ba chen po'i sku //
translated: The fourth is the great bliss body.

original: slob dpon bcu gcig tu dbye zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon bcu gcig tu dbye zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the sequence of the eleven divisions of the master:

original: chu dang / dbu rgyan dang / rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / ming dang / dam tshig gsum dang / brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / skyabs sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chu dang / dbu rgyan dang / rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / ming dang / dam tshig gsum dang / brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / skyabs sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: water, crown, vajra, bell, name, three pledges, conduct, prophecy, and granting refuge.

original: bcu gnyis pa gsang bzhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid kyis kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i byang @114b chub kyi sems myang ba nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa gsang bzhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid kyis kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i byang @114b chub kyi sems myang ba nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The twelfth is called the secret, which means the experience of the bodhicitta that is the nonduality of the relative and the ultimate through the characteristics of the sambhogakƒÅya.

original: bcu gsum pa shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba ni shes rab stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes shes nas spros pa dang bral ba gnyis su med pa /
analyzed: bcu gsum pa shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba ni shes rab stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes shes nas spros pa dang bral ba gnyis su med pa /
translated: The thirteenth is called the wisdom gnosis, which means the gnosis of the perfection of wisdom power, free from proliferation, nondual,

original: de nyid ye shes la 'jug pa /
analyzed: de nyid ye shes la 'jug pa /
translated: and engaged in that gnosis.

original: de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni de nyid ye shes kyi 'jug pa las gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni de nyid ye shes kyi 'jug pa las gzhan ma yin /
translated: As such, that is the fourteenth, which means that the gnosis is not other than the engagement of that gnosis.

original: ye shes ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku nyid gsang ba'i dbang po rgyud kyi rim pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: ye shes ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku nyid gsang ba'i dbang po rgyud kyi rim pa zhes bshad do //
translated: The gnosis is the nature of space, the great bliss of the kƒÅya itself, the stage of the tantra of the lord of the secret.

original: gzhan ni don ji lta ba bzhin du bshad /
analyzed: gzhan ni don ji lta ba bzhin du bshad /
translated: The others are explained according to the meaning.

original: sa dang 'bras bu gsum du dbye ba zhes bya ba la don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: sa dang 'bras bu gsum du dbye ba zhes bya ba la don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The explanation of the divisions of the stages and the results:

original: gang zhig rgyu yin pa de rang rtsa ba /
analyzed: gang zhig rgyu yin pa de rang rtsa ba /
translated: That which is the cause is the root.

original: 'di ru rtsa ba'i sgra ni 'od rab kyi rang bzhin /
analyzed: 'di ru rtsa ba'i sgra ni 'od rab kyi rang bzhin /
translated: Here, the word root is the nature of light.

original: chos kyi sku gsungs so //
analyzed: chos kyi sku gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be the dharmakƒÅya.

original: de yang sku dang gsungs dang thugs gsum du dbye ba /
analyzed: de yang sku dang gsungs dang thugs gsum du dbye ba /
translated: Moreover, it is divided into three: body, speech, and mind.

original: gang zhig bum pa'i dbang la sogs pa'i don de ni sku /
analyzed: gang zhig bum pa'i dbang la sogs pa'i don de ni sku /
translated: That which is the meaning of the vase empowerment, and so on, is the body.

original: gang zhig gsang ba'i dbang de ni gsung /
analyzed: gang zhig gsang ba'i dbang de ni gsung /
translated: That which is the secret empowerment is speech.

original: gang zhig shes rab ye shes kyi dbang de ni thugs so //
analyzed: gang zhig shes rab ye shes kyi dbang de ni thugs so //
translated: That which is the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment is mind.

original: de rnams kyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sems las byung ba'i grags pa can /
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sems las byung ba'i grags pa can /
translated: The so-called result of those is the one known as the mind,

original: bde ba chen po rgyal lo //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rgyal lo //
translated: the great bliss king.

original: yang na 'bras bu gsum du dbye ba'i don la ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang na 'bras bu gsum du dbye ba'i don la ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Again, the meaning of the division into three results is as follows:

original: bzhi pa ni ye shes nam mkha'i rang bzhin phyir rgyu la /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni ye shes nam mkha'i rang bzhin phyir rgyu la /
translated: The fourth is the gnosis that is the nature of space.

original: 'bras bu de'i phyir de nyid gsum gyi ngo bo nyid dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: 'bras bu de'i phyir de nyid gsum gyi ngo bo nyid dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Since it is the result of the cause, it is said to be the nature of the three realities by ≈örƒ´ Vajradhara.

original: dga' ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dga' ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya zhes bya ba la /
translated: It should be understood by the divisions of joy.

original: dbang rnams la phyi'i rim pas dri ma med pa'i sa la sogs ba'i 'bras bu thob pa /
analyzed: dbang rnams la phyi'i rim pas dri ma med pa'i sa la sogs ba'i 'bras bu thob pa /
translated: In the initiations, the result is the stainless levels, etc., by the outer process;

original: nang gi rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: nang gi rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: and the result is joy, etc., by the inner process.

original: 'khor lo rnams la don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo rnams la don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of the wheels is as follows:

original: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
analyzed: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
translated: At the time of the vase initiation,

original: 'khrig pa dang 'o las sku'i 'khor lor dga' ba /
analyzed: 'khrig pa dang 'o las sku'i 'khor lor dga' ba /
translated: from the sexual union and kissing, there is joy in the body wheel.

original: bdud rtsi myong ba'i dus su /
analyzed: bdud rtsi myong ba'i dus su /
translated: At the time of tasting the elixir,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i reg bya tshor ba las gsang ba'i dbang las gsung gi 'khor lor mchog gi dga' ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i reg bya tshor ba las gsang ba'i dbang las gsung gi 'khor lor mchog gi dga' ba /
translated: from the feeling of the supramundane tactile object, there is supreme joy in the speech wheel from the secret initiation.

original: shes rab thabs mnyam par sbyar ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba las thugs kyi 'khor lor chad pa'i dga' ba /
analyzed: shes rab thabs mnyam par sbyar ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ba las thugs kyi 'khor lor chad pa'i dga' ba /
translated: From the experience of the bliss of the union of wisdom and means, there is the joy of cessation in the mind wheel.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi bye brag gi dran pa med cing gang zhig dga' ba spros pa ye shes kyi 'khor lo rang bzhin gyi dga' ba zhes aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis gsungs so //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi bye brag gi dran pa med cing gang zhig dga' ba spros pa ye shes kyi 'khor lo rang bzhin gyi dga' ba zhes aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis gsungs so //
translated: From the absence of memory of the distinctions of self and other, there is the joy of the wheel of pristine awareness, which is the natural joy, according to the treatise of Indrabhuti.

original: yar ngo'i tshes gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yar ngo'i tshes gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The third day of the waxing moon and so forth.

original: bram ze 'dra bu'i gzhung gis gsang ba'i dbang bskur @115a * //
analyzed: bram ze 'dra bu'i gzhung gis gsang ba'i dbang bskur @115a * //
translated: In the text of the Brahmana, it is the time for the secret consecration.

original: ba'i dus su byang chub kyi sems thig le gsum gzung ngo //
analyzed: ba'i dus su byang chub kyi sems thig le gsum gzung ngo //
translated: One should hold the three drops of the bodhicitta.

original: thabs kyi zhal la sogs pa sgra ji bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: thabs kyi zhal la sogs pa sgra ji bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The face of the method and so on are explained literally.

original: lo bcu gnyis ma gsung pa'i dbang gi dus su'o //
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis ma gsung pa'i dbang gi dus su'o //
translated: The twelve-year-old is the time for the consecration of speech.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na padma can ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba byang chub kyi sems la bsrung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na padma can ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba byang chub kyi sems la bsrung ngo //
translated: Why? Because it is not the lotus lady, one should guard the secret bodhicitta.

original: lo bcu drug dang ldan pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi skabs su /
analyzed: lo bcu drug dang ldan pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi skabs su /
translated: The sixteen-year-old is the occasion of the wisdom-knowledge consecration.

original: dga' ba rab kyi ye shes pa bsrung ba dang byung ba gnyis kyi don du'o //
analyzed: dga' ba rab kyi ye shes pa bsrung ba dang byung ba gnyis kyi don du'o //
translated: It is for the purpose of guarding the wisdom of supreme joy and the two meanings of arising.

original: lo nyi shu dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lo nyi shu dang ldan pa /
translated: The twenty-year-old

original: gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gnyis kyi don ni mi rnyed pa'i phyir spangs bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gnyis kyi don ni mi rnyed pa'i phyir spangs bar bya'o //
translated: is to be abandoned because the meaning of the two, the secret and the wisdom-knowledge consecrations, is not found.

original: de ltar yang nyi shu lon pa yan chad ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub ring di bgyid pa nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar yang nyi shu lon pa yan chad ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub ring di bgyid pa nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One, the Vajra Holder, has said that those who are twenty years old and above should practice the attainment of the consort.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis lo nyid shu lon pa byang chub kyi sems la 'khrug par byed 'khrug pas dga' ba 'byung bar mi 'grub /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gis lo nyid shu lon pa byang chub kyi sems la 'khrug par byed 'khrug pas dga' ba 'byung bar mi 'grub /
translated: According to the Vajra Master's text, those who are twenty years old should be aroused in the mind of enlightenment. By being aroused, joy arises, and it is not accomplished.

original: rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud du 'dus par byas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla ma'i rgyud du 'dus par byas so //
translated: It is included in the Yoga Tantra.

original: sring mo la sogs pa mtshan ma rnyed pa la /
analyzed: sring mo la sogs pa mtshan ma rnyed pa la /
translated: For those who have found the signs, such as a sister,

original: dbang bskur ba gsum gyi dus su rig par gsungs so //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba gsum gyi dus su rig par gsungs so //
translated: it is said that they should be initiated at the time of the three empowerments.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mtshan ma ni ye shes lnga la rgyu yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni ye shes lnga la rgyu yin no //
translated: The signs are the cause of the five wisdoms.

original: rgyu yod pas the tshom med pa'i 'bras bu rnyed do //
analyzed: rgyu yod pas the tshom med pa'i 'bras bu rnyed do //
translated: Because the cause exists, the result without doubt is attained.

original: ye shes kyi 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la sring mo la sogs pas ni sdig pa med do //
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la sring mo la sogs pas ni sdig pa med do //
translated: For the lord of yoga whose result of wisdom has become manifest, there is no sin in having a sister and so forth.

original: de ni re zhig kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni re zhig kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the sequence of the conventional truth.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa'i rim pas nang gi bum pa'i dbang gi dus su skad cig bye brag gsal bar byed pa'i phyir sring mo //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa'i rim pas nang gi bum pa'i dbang gi dus su skad cig bye brag gsal bar byed pa'i phyir sring mo //
translated: By the stage of ultimate truth, at the time of the vase empowerment of the inner [empowerment], the sister is the one who clarifies the particular moment.

original: gsang ba'i dbang gi dus su dga' ba 'jo ba'i phyir bu mo /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang gi dus su dga' ba 'jo ba'i phyir bu mo /
translated: At the time of the secret empowerment, the daughter is the one who causes the joy to arise.

original: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su ro thams cad la snang bar byed pa'i phyir chung ma /
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su ro thams cad la snang bar byed pa'i phyir chung ma /
translated: At the time of the wisdom-awareness empowerment, the wife is the one who illuminates all tastes.

original: chung ma slob dpon la dbul bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun rdzob kyi skabs su don ji lta ba bzhin gyis rtsab gsungs so //
analyzed: chung ma slob dpon la dbul bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun rdzob kyi skabs su don ji lta ba bzhin gyis rtsab gsungs so //
translated: The wife should be offered to the master and so on are the words of the root in the context of the relative.

original: bla ma'i gzungs kyis bdag nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: bla ma'i gzungs kyis bdag nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: The line the one who is the nature of the guru's dhƒÅra·πáƒ´

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rje btsun nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rje btsun nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: means the revered Vajrasattva himself.

original: bdag mchod pa las dngos grub rnyed pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag mchod pa las dngos grub rnyed pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The line attain accomplishment from one's own worship

original: ye shes chen po thob ces dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes chen po thob ces dgongs pa'o //
translated: means attain great wisdom, it is thought.

original: de ma thag tu phyag rgya chen po la sogs zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ma thag tu phyag rgya chen po la sogs zhes bya ba la /
translated: The line immediately, the great seal, and so onüîΩmeans the great seal, and so on, are attained.

original: don 'di ltar bshad de bla ma rje btsun la yon phul ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i phyis nas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster ba /
analyzed: don 'di ltar bshad de bla ma rje btsun la yon phul ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i phyis nas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster ba /
translated: This is explained as follows: After offering gifts to the guru, worship, and so forth, the master should give the student the Great Seal.

original: shes rab ma me tog dang spos la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis yang dag @115b par mchod par byas nas lha mo'i gzugs su bsgoms te /
analyzed: shes rab ma me tog dang spos la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis yang dag @115b par mchod par byas nas lha mo'i gzugs su bsgoms te /
translated: Having made proper worship with the substances of the wisdom consort, flowers, incense, and so forth, he should meditate on the form of the goddess.

original: slob ma'i yan lag thams cad du reg pa'i don du bsnyen par bya zhing sbyin par bya zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i yan lag thams cad du reg pa'i don du bsnyen par bya zhing sbyin par bya zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: He should be devoted to and give the consort to the student for the purpose of touching all the limbs of the student.

original: de ni nang gi bum pa'i dbang gi phyir yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa lag tu gzung bar bya //
analyzed: de ni nang gi bum pa'i dbang gi phyir yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa lag tu gzung bar bya //
translated: For the sake of the inner vase empowerment, he should hold the victorious vase in his hand.

original: gsang ba'i dbang gi dus su slob ma la ye shes goms pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang gi dus su slob ma la ye shes goms pa'i phyir /
translated: At the time of the secret empowerment, for the sake of the student‚Äôs familiarity with gnosis,

original: dang po slob dpon gyis sna tshogs sbyor thabs kyis bsnyen pa bya'o //
analyzed: dang po slob dpon gyis sna tshogs sbyor thabs kyis bsnyen pa bya'o //
translated: first the master should be devoted to the consort through the method of union.

original: bsnyen pa sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba de ni slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya gzhug par bya zhes sgra ji bzhin gyi rgyud kyi don no //
analyzed: bsnyen pa sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba de ni slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya gzhug par bya zhes sgra ji bzhin gyi rgyud kyi don no //
translated: The arising of the bodhicitta through the yoga of approach is to be caused to descend into the mouth of the disciple, which is the meaning of the Tantra of the Clear Meaning.

original: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i don gyis slob ma gzhan gyi dbang gang zhig 'byung ba de ni bdag gi gnas /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i don gyis slob ma gzhan gyi dbang gang zhig 'byung ba de ni bdag gi gnas /
translated: The meaning that is not the clear meaning is that the arising of the other-dependent disciple is one's place.

original: slob dpon nag po'i gzhung gis /
analyzed: slob dpon nag po'i gzhung gis /
translated: The text of Master Krishna says:

original: bdag ni gnas rdo rje rin po che'i snying po gzhan gyi gnas ni padma rin chen gyi snying po //
analyzed: bdag ni gnas rdo rje rin po che'i snying po gzhan gyi gnas ni padma rin chen gyi snying po //
translated: My place is the essence of the vajra jewel; the place of the other is the essence of the lotus jewel.

original: slob dpon ku ku r'a dza'i gzhung gis /
analyzed: slob dpon ku ku r'a dza'i gzhung gis /
translated: The text of Master Kukuraja says:

original: bdag gi gnas ni mchog gi dga' ba /
analyzed: bdag gi gnas ni mchog gi dga' ba /
translated: My place is supreme joy;

original: gzhan gyi gnas ni chad pa'i dga' ba ;
analyzed: gzhan gyi gnas ni chad pa'i dga' ba ;
translated: the place of the other is the joy of cessation.üîΩThe text of Sri Indrabhuti says:

original: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis bdag gi gnas ni bskyed rim /
analyzed: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis bdag gi gnas ni bskyed rim /
translated: My place is the creation stage;

original: gzhan gyi gnas ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyi gnas ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa /
translated: the place of the other is the completion stage.

original: slob dpon do mbi pa'i zhal snga nas kyis /üîΩbdag gi gnas ni thams las byung ba /
analyzed: slob dpon do mbi pa'i zhal snga nas kyis / bdag gi gnas ni thams las byung ba /
translated: The text of Master Dombipa says:üîΩMy place is the source of all;

original: gzhan gyi gnas ni thams so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi gnas ni thams so //
translated: the place of the other is all.

original: slob dpon gzhan pa'i yes shes dang / ye shes byung ba zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gzhan pa'i yes shes dang / ye shes byung ba zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the other master's wisdom and the arising of wisdom is intended.

original: srin lag mthe bong la sogs zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: srin lag mthe bong la sogs zhes bya ba la /
translated: The ring finger, thumb, and so on means

original: phyi'i don gyi rdo rje rin chen gyi snying po'i nang nas byang chub kyi sems slob ma'i mgrin pa'i nang nas blugs te mgrin pa'i rtsa gnyis ba tsir bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i don gyi rdo rje rin chen gyi snying po'i nang nas byang chub kyi sems slob ma'i mgrin pa'i nang nas blugs te mgrin pa'i rtsa gnyis ba tsir bar bya'o //
translated: that the bodhicitta is poured from the interior of the essence of the outer-object-vajra-jewel into the throat of the disciple and is to be held in the throat.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: des ni phyis nas ji ltar nyams su myong ba bzhin shes la /
analyzed: des ni phyis nas ji ltar nyams su myong ba bzhin shes la /
translated: Because of that, later on, it is known just as it is experienced,

original: rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yang dag par 'byung ba zhes sgra ji bzhin gyis rgyud kyi don bshad de /
analyzed: rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yang dag par 'byung ba zhes sgra ji bzhin gyis rgyud kyi don bshad de /
translated: and the meaning of the tantra is explained literally as the arising of the nature of one's vidyƒÅ.

original: de ru dpe ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ru dpe ni 'di lta ste /

analyzed: gang gi tshe kha ru gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is located in the mouth,

original: dbang grags shes rab bsam pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dbang grags shes rab bsam pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: the signs of power, fame, wisdom, and thought arise.

original: gang gi tshe mgrin par gnas par gyur ba de'i tshe //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mgrin par gnas par gyur ba de'i tshe //
translated: When it is located in the throat,

original: nor la chags pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nor la chags pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: the signs of attachment to wealth arise.

original: gang gi tshe snying gar gnas par gyur ba de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin skom pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe snying gar gnas par gyur ba de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin skom pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: When it is located in the heart, the signs of the nature of invisibility, thirst, arise.

original: gang gi tshe mtshan ma'i rtsa ba la gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mtshan ma'i rtsa ba la gnas par gyur na /
translated: When it is located at the base of the sexual organ,

original: de'i tshe dbang grags can brgyal ba'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe dbang grags can brgyal ba'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: the signs of the fainting of powerful and famous people arise.

original: gang gi tshe mtshan mar gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mtshan mar gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is located in the sexual organ,

original: longs spyod kyi rang bzhin gnyid sad pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: longs spyod kyi rang bzhin gnyid sad pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: When it is in the anus, the sign of the nature of enjoyment arises, the sign of sleep.

original: gang gi tshe gzhang khar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin dbyal  gyi rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzhang khar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin dbyal  gyi rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: When it is in the genitals, the sign of the nature of invisibility arises, the sign of dawn.

original: gang gi tshe bral ru gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bral ru gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is in the thighs,

original: dbang grags can dga' ba la tshim pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dbang grags can dga' ba la tshim pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: the sign of the nature of power and fame arises, the sign of satisfaction.üîΩWhen it is in the two knees,

original: gang gi tshe rje ngar gnyis la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe longs spyod kyi rang bzhin sems g-yo ba'i rtags 'byung ngo //üîΩgang gi tshe sor mor gnas par gyur ba de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin rgyug pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rje ngar gnyis la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe longs spyod kyi rang bzhin sems g-yo ba'i rtags 'byung ngo // gang gi tshe sor mor gnas par gyur ba de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin rgyug pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: the sign of the nature of enjoyment arises, the sign of a moving mind.üîΩWhen it is in the toes, the sign of the nature of invisibility arises, the sign of running.

original: gang gi tshe rkang mthil la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe dbang grags can mi rtogs pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rkang mthil la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe dbang grags can mi rtogs pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: When it is in the soles of the feet, the sign of the nature of power and fame arises, the sign of nonconceptualization.

original: gang gi tshe mthe bong la gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mthe bong la gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is in the big toes,

original: longs spyod kyi rang bzhin nad kyi rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: longs spyod kyi rang bzhin nad kyi rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: the sign of the nature of enjoyment arises, the sign of illness.

original: gang gi tshe pus mo gnyis la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin sems stor ba'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe pus mo gnyis la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin sems stor ba'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: When it is in the two knees, then the sign of the loss of the mind of the nature of invisibility arises.

original: gang gi tshe phyi nas yang gyen gyi rim pas thugs kyi 'khor lo la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe dbang grags can rgod pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe phyi nas yang gyen gyi rim pas thugs kyi 'khor lo la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe dbang grags can rgod pa'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: When it is in the heart cakra, then the sign of the pride of the powerful one arises.

original: gang gi tshe gsung gi 'khor lo la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gsung gi 'khor lo la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is in the throat cakra, then

original: longs spyod can klu'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: longs spyod can klu'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: the sign of the nƒÅga who enjoys arises.

original: gang gi tshe @125b sku'i 'khor la la gnas pa de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i rtags 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe @125b sku'i 'khor la la gnas pa de'i tshe mi snang ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i rtags 'byung ngo //
translated: When it is in the navel cakra, then the sign of the joy of the nature of invisibility arises.

original: de lta bu nyid shu rtsa bdun gyi gnas la /üîΩkun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i steng dang / 'og tu 'gro ba las ye shes kyi rang bzhin las 'byung ba'i dus su //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid shu rtsa bdun gyi gnas la / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i steng dang / 'og tu 'gro ba las ye shes kyi rang bzhin las 'byung ba'i dus su //
translated: In this way, in the twenty-seven locations,üîΩfrom the alaya consciousness,

original: mi snang ba dang / longs spyod dang dbang la /
analyzed: mi snang ba dang / longs spyod dang dbang la /
translated: the arising of the nature of pristine consciousness is the time of invisibility, enjoyment, and power.

original: dpal ka ma la sh'i la'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gi gzhung gis rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gi don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dpal ka ma la sh'i la'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gi gzhung gis rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzhung gi don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of the text of the Vajra Master is as follows, according to the oral tradition of the venerable KamalarƒÅpƒÅ:

original: rang gi bde ba nyams su myong ba la gang zhig mi gsal ba nyid dam /
analyzed: rang gi bde ba nyams su myong ba la gang zhig mi gsal ba nyid dam /
translated: That which is not clear in the experience of one's own bliss,

original: yang na rab tu 'jug pa de ni mi snang ngo //
analyzed: yang na rab tu 'jug pa de ni mi snang ngo //
translated: or that which is not engaged, is not seen.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni longs spyod do //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ni longs spyod do //
translated: The experience of the great bliss of the non-duality of the conventional and the ultimate is enjoyment.

original: de dag gi ye shes kyi lta bas gang zhig 'khrul pa med pa nyid de ni dbang ngo //
analyzed: de dag gi ye shes kyi lta bas gang zhig 'khrul pa med pa nyid de ni dbang ngo //
translated: The view of their wisdom, which is non-erroneous, is empowerment.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud la sogs par bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud la sogs par bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin gyis gsungs so //
translated: The activities in the Vajra Garland Tantra and so forth are taught literally.

original: de ni mtshan mo'i don rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyis ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar dpyad de /üîΩmtshan mo shes rab ces su grags //
analyzed: de ni mtshan mo'i don rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyis ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar dpyad de / mtshan mo shes rab ces su grags //
translated: That should be analyzed according to the oral tradition of the Vajra Master, as it is explained in the meaning of the night.üîΩThe night is renowned as wisdom.

original: shes rab mtshan mo dgung nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab mtshan mo dgung nyid 'gyur //
translated: Wisdom is the night, the full moon.

original: zhes gnyis su med pa'i ngo bos nges pa'i don dang drang ba'i don gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'o //
analyzed: zhes gnyis su med pa'i ngo bos nges pa'i don dang drang ba'i don gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'o //
translated: Thus, the Word of the Lord is of two kinds, that of definitive meaning by way of the nondual nature, and that of interpretable meaning by way of the dualistic nature.

original: slob dpon sha ba ri'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gis /
analyzed: slob dpon sha ba ri'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gis /
translated: According to the instructions of Master ≈öavaripa,

original: gang zhig shin tu mtshan dang ldan pa la lo bcu gnyis lon pa /
analyzed: gang zhig shin tu mtshan dang ldan pa la lo bcu gnyis lon pa /
translated: one who is endowed with the characteristics, twelve years old,

original: mi gsal ba'i padma can de ni mtshan mo'i 'du shes shes rab slob dpon au rgyan gyi gzhung gis ma grags pa'i rang bzhin //
analyzed: mi gsal ba'i padma can de ni mtshan mo'i 'du shes shes rab slob dpon au rgyan gyi gzhung gis ma grags pa'i rang bzhin //
translated: and has an unclear lotus is a wisdom consort of the perception of night, according to the tradition of O·∏ç·∏çiyƒÅna.

original: rang gi rigs las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi rigs las skyes pa'o //
translated: She is born of one‚Äôs own caste.

original: slob dpon kha che'i gzhung gis yul gyi g-yo bas 'khyar ba'i kha che'i sems so //
analyzed: slob dpon kha che'i gzhung gis yul gyi g-yo bas 'khyar ba'i kha che'i sems so //
translated: According to the tradition of the master of Kashmir, she is a Kashmiri woman whose mind is distracted by the movement of objects.

original: slob dpon ku ma r'u pa'i gzhung gis nag sngon yan lag nas lo bcu drug dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon ku ma r'u pa'i gzhung gis nag sngon yan lag nas lo bcu drug dang ldan pa'o //
translated: According to the tradition of Master KumƒÅrƒ´pƒÅda, she is sixteen years old and has dark limbs.

original: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis byang chub kyi sems zla ba rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas kyi gzhung gis byang chub kyi sems zla ba rgyas pa'o //
translated: According to the tradition of Master Kukkuripa, the bodhicitta is the full moon.

original: shes rab mtshan mod gung nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: shes rab mtshan mod gung nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: The wisdom consort is called ‚Äúthe midday sun.‚Äù

original: bla ma'i zhal snga nas don ni 'di ltar bshad de /
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal snga nas don ni 'di ltar bshad de /
translated: The teacher's oral instruction explains the meaning in this way:

original: shes rab ces bya ba la nga tshol bab pa /
analyzed: shes rab ces bya ba la nga tshol bab pa /
translated: The so-called wisdom is the one who is the object of my search.

original: mtshan mo zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags chen pos long ba /
analyzed: mtshan mo zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags chen pos long ba /
translated: The so-called night is the one who is blinded by great passion.

original: dgung nyid ces bya ba ni nam mkha'i chung zad dbye ba'o //
analyzed: dgung nyid ces bya ba ni nam mkha'i chung zad dbye ba'o //
translated: The so-called midnight is the division of the sky.

original: mtshan mo'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la nam mkha'i chu skyes na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems shin du dkar ba'i phyir de dang zla ba /
analyzed: mtshan mo'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la nam mkha'i chu skyes na gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems shin du dkar ba'i phyir de dang zla ba /
translated: The so-called night aspect is the moon, because the bodhicitta that resides in the lotus of the sky is very white.

original: mchog pas mchog dga' ba sbyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no @126a * //
analyzed: mchog pas mchog dga' ba sbyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no @126a * //
translated: The so-called supreme joy is the nature of nirvana, because it is the giver of supreme joy.

original: slob dpon nag po'i gzhung gis ni dga' bral sbyin pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: slob dpon nag po'i gzhung gis ni dga' bral sbyin pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The teacher K·πõ·π£·πáa says that it is the nature of nirvana, because it is the giver of the joy of separation.

original: shes rab 'di ru gnyis dbye zhes //
analyzed: shes rab 'di ru gnyis dbye zhes //
translated: The so-called wisdom is divided into two here.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dngos zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje slob dpon gyis zhal snga nas sgra ji bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dngos zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje slob dpon gyis zhal snga nas sgra ji bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: The so-called relative and ultimate realities are taught by the Blessed One, the vajra master, literally.

original: kun rdzob reg bya skye med pa //
analyzed: kun rdzob reg bya skye med pa //
translated: The relative is the non-arising of tactile sensation.

original: zhes bya ba la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su lha'i rnam par byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su lha'i rnam par byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: In the context of the creation stage, one is consecrated in the form of a deity.

original: reg bya'i padma la /
analyzed: reg bya'i padma la /
translated: On the tactile sensation of the lotus,

original: bdud rtsi myongs ba'i phyir lo bcu drug dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi myongs ba'i phyir lo bcu drug dang ldan pa'o //
translated: one experiences the nectar, being sixteen years old.

original: dpal badzra pu ti'i gzhung gis /
analyzed: dpal badzra pu ti'i gzhung gis /
translated: According to the text of ≈örƒ´ VajrapƒÅ·πái,

original: nang gi bdag nyid las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: the inner nature is the karma consort.

original: slob dpon do mbi pa'i zhal snga nas ni bya gdong ngo //
analyzed: slob dpon do mbi pa'i zhal snga nas ni bya gdong ngo //
translated: According to the statement of Master Do·πápe Dorje, it is the bird face.

original: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas ni srog gi rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas ni srog gi rtsa ba'o //
translated: According to Master Kukkurƒ´pƒÅ, it is the life channel.

original: don dam pa'i reg bya dang bral ba skyed byed ma zhes bya ba la dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i reg bya dang bral ba skyed byed ma zhes bya ba la dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma'o //
translated: The ultimate is free from tactile sensation, called the creator. According to the text of ≈örƒ´ Indrabh≈´ti, it is the Bhagavatƒ´ NairƒÅtmya.

original: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gis rtsa rtog med pa /
analyzed: slob dpon ku ku ri'i zhal snga nas kyi man ngag gis rtsa rtog med pa /
translated: According to the esoteric instructions of Master Kukkurƒ´pƒÅ, it is the nonconceptual channel.

original: reg bya dang bral ba gang zhig bde ba /
analyzed: reg bya dang bral ba gang zhig bde ba /
translated: It is free from tactile sensation, bliss,

original: blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid dka' //
analyzed: blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid dka' //
translated: and difficult to see, having the characteristic of difficulty.

original: zhes bya ba la ni brjod du med pa'i phyir sgra ji bzhin pa'i don bka' stsal to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ni brjod du med pa'i phyir sgra ji bzhin pa'i don bka' stsal to //
translated: Here, the meaning of just as it is is stated because it is inexpressible.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can //
translated: Having the nature of essencelessness,

original: de'i mtshan mo bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: de'i mtshan mo bdag gis bshad //
translated: I will explain that at night.

original: ces bya ba la rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i skabs su brdar byas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i skabs su brdar byas so //
translated: Here, in the context of the completion stage, it is made into a sign.

original: nyin mo thabs su grags zhes bya ba la slob dpon gyis zhal snga nas 'di ltar bshad de /
analyzed: nyin mo thabs su grags zhes bya ba la slob dpon gyis zhal snga nas 'di ltar bshad de /
translated: As for day is known as method, the master has explained as follows:

original: nyin mo'i sgras ni rin po che nyid ma'i 'od zer can thar pa zhes bya ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i gang zag yang na grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob pa'i don du thabs tsam bsam pa'i phyir thabs so //
analyzed: nyin mo'i sgras ni rin po che nyid ma'i 'od zer can thar pa zhes bya ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i gang zag yang na grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob pa'i don du thabs tsam bsam pa'i phyir thabs so //
translated: The word day refers to the light rays of the mother Ratnasambhava. Liberation means a person who is like that, or the mere thought of method for attaining the stage of Vajradhara in countless world systems. Therefore, it is method.üîΩMethod becomes the sun.

original: thabs ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la de ni thabs don gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: thabs ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la de ni thabs don gsal bar byas so //
translated: Here, that method clarifies the meaning.

original: slob dpon nag po pa'i gzhung gis ni gsang ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i nang du 'byung ba mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo byang chub kyi sems so //üîΩbha ga las byung nyi mar 'gyur /
analyzed: slob dpon nag po pa'i gzhung gis ni gsang ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i nang du 'byung ba mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo byang chub kyi sems so // bha ga las byung nyi mar 'gyur /
translated: The text of Master Krishna says that the supreme joy, which is the essence of the bodhicitta, arises from the secret vajra jewel.

original: zhes bya ba la nges pa'i don dang drang pa'i don gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la nges pa'i don dang drang pa'i don gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'o //
translated: The line arising from the bhaga, becoming the sun is the word of the Bhagavan, both in its definitive and interpretable meanings.

original: dpal ainbra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis /
analyzed: dpal ainbra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis /
translated: The text of Sri Anangabharavi says:

original: bha ga ni shes rab /
analyzed: bha ga ni shes rab /
translated: The bhaga is wisdom.

original: nyi ma ni thabs /
analyzed: nyi ma ni thabs /
translated: The sun is method.

original: 'byung ba ni byang chub kyi sems /üîΩnyi ma bha ga'i bdag po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'byung ba ni byang chub kyi sems / nyi ma bha ga'i bdag po zhes bya ba la /
translated: Arising is bodhicitta.

original: shes rab ma la thabs mgon po yin no //
analyzed: shes rab ma la thabs mgon po yin no //
translated: The line the sun, the lord of the bhaga means that the lord of the bhaga is the method, the protector.

original: yang na @126b khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: yang na @126b khong du chud par byed do //
translated: Alternatively, arising means is understood.

original: slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis /
analyzed: slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis /
translated: The text of Master Shavari says:

original: bha ga ni shes rab kyi mngal gyis padma rgyas pa /
analyzed: bha ga ni shes rab kyi mngal gyis padma rgyas pa /
translated: The bhaga is the lotus of the womb of wisdom.

original: nyi ma zhes bya ba ni rang byung gi me tog //
analyzed: nyi ma zhes bya ba ni rang byung gi me tog //
translated: The line becoming the sun means the self-arisen flower.

original: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni de las skye ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni de las skye ba'o //
translated: The line arising means arising from that.

original: slob dpon badzra r'a ga'i gzhung gis bha ga ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: slob dpon badzra r'a ga'i gzhung gis bha ga ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin /
translated: The text of Master Vajraraga explains that the bhaga has the nature of the joy of cessation.

original: byang chub kyi sems nyi ma ni mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems nyi ma ni mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo //
translated: The bodhicitta sun has the nature of supreme joy.

original: bdag po'i sgra ni rang bzhin gyis dga' ba nyid do //üîΩsrid pa'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag po'i sgra ni rang bzhin gyis dga' ba nyid do // srid pa'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur //
translated: The word ‚Äúlord‚Äù is natural joy.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The aspect of existence becomes the sun.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas /
translated: The vajra master says:

original: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyal po'i rim par 'di bshad de /
analyzed: brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyal po'i rim par 'di bshad de /
translated: This is explained in the sequence of the king of the second chapter.

original: shes rab ye shes kyi man ngag bsgom zhing ro chen po nyams su myong ba dang / de bzhin gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rin po che'i 'khor lor dga' ba chen po'i gnas su rgyun mi chad pa'i rnam par 'byed pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo zhig dga' ba 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi man ngag bsgom zhing ro chen po nyams su myong ba dang / de bzhin gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rin po che'i 'khor lor dga' ba chen po'i gnas su rgyun mi chad pa'i rnam par 'byed pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo zhig dga' ba 'byung ba'o //
translated: Meditating on the wisdom-knowledge instructions and experiencing the great taste, and likewise in the secret vajra-jewel chakra, the great joy abode is the arising of joy, the essence of the uninterrupted differentiation.

original: de rang nyid shin tu gsal ba'i phyir nyi ma'o //
analyzed: de rang nyid shin tu gsal ba'i phyir nyi ma'o //
translated: Since that is itself very clear, it is the sun.

original: zla ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zla ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The moon is the essence of nirvana.

original: shes rab ye shes kyi dga' ba las ci zhig dga' ba chen po'i phyogs su 'du shes med pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi dga' ba las ci zhig dga' ba chen po'i phyogs su 'du shes med pa nyid do //
translated: From the joy of the wisdom-intuition, what is the joy? It is the side of great joy, which is the state of non-perception.

original: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis rtog pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis rtog pa med pa nyid do //
translated: According to the text of Sri Indrabhuti, it is non-imagination.

original: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis ni chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis ni chad pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: According to the text of other masters, it is the joy of cessation.

original: srid pa de ni rigs su bshad //
analyzed: srid pa de ni rigs su bshad //
translated: That existence is explained as the family.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: dpal pra ha sti sta badzra au ta'i gzhung gis ni 'di ltar bshad de /
analyzed: dpal pra ha sti sta badzra au ta'i gzhung gis ni 'di ltar bshad de /
translated: According to the text of Sri Prahastitabhadravajra, it is explained as follows:

original: srid pa zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: srid pa zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa /
translated: Existence is the fundamental consciousness.

original: rigs zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga grub pa'i sku /
analyzed: rigs zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga grub pa'i sku /
translated: Family is the five aggregates, the body of realization.

original: zla ba la zhes bya ba ni srid pa bar ma do la /
analyzed: zla ba la zhes bya ba ni srid pa bar ma do la /
translated: On the moon is the intermediate existence.

original: rigs zhes bya ba la ni srid pa len pa /
analyzed: rigs zhes bya ba la ni srid pa len pa /
translated: Family is the acceptance of existence.

original: nyi ma las zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'dus pa'i dran pas so //
analyzed: nyi ma las zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi 'dus pa'i dran pas so //
translated: From the sun is the recollection of the gathering of former vows.

original: slob dpon do mbi ba'i zhal snga nas srid pa ni thabs /
analyzed: slob dpon do mbi ba'i zhal snga nas srid pa ni thabs /
translated: According to the venerable Dombi Heruka, existence is the means.

original: rigs ni shes rab /
analyzed: rigs ni shes rab /
translated: Family is wisdom.

original: slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rje'i gzhung gis srid pa ni mchog gi dga' ba'i rang bzhin shu kra /
analyzed: slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rje'i gzhung gis srid pa ni mchog gi dga' ba'i rang bzhin shu kra /
translated: The treatise of the master Ocean-born Vajra says that existence is the nature of supreme joy, which is semen.

original: rigs zhes bya ba ni rakta /
analyzed: rigs zhes bya ba ni rakta /
translated: The ‚Äúfamily‚Äù is called blood.

original: zla ba byang chub kyi sems la rigs skye ba /
analyzed: zla ba byang chub kyi sems la rigs skye ba /
translated: The family is born from the moon, the bodhicitta.

original: nyi ma la rakta zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nyi ma la rakta zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúsun‚Äù is blood.

original: slob dpon gyi gzhung gis de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can byang chub kyi sa bon shin tu rnam par 'grub pa'i phyir rakta'i ngo bor gyur to //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi gzhung gis de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can byang chub kyi sa bon shin tu rnam par 'grub pa'i phyir rakta'i ngo bor gyur to //
translated: The treatise of the master says that since it is the seed of enlightenment, which is the nature of nirvana, it becomes the essence of blood.

original: gang gi tshe rang gi mtshan nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang gi mtshan nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it becomes its own nature,

original: rdo rje rin po che 'dra bar 'gyur ro //üîΩgang gi tshe cung @127a * //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che 'dra bar 'gyur ro // gang gi tshe cung @127a * //
translated: it becomes like a vajra jewel.

original: zad stobs kyis 'pho bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe skye pa'i gzugs can du gyur to //
analyzed: zad stobs kyis 'pho bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe skye pa'i gzugs can du gyur to //
translated: When it moves a little by its own power, it becomes the form of a fetus.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs so //
translated: This is the side of the creation stage.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su spros pa med pa'i phyir nyi ma grub ces bya ba ni mchog gi dga' ba'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par rtog pa'i rigs dang bral zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su spros pa med pa'i phyir nyi ma grub ces bya ba ni mchog gi dga' ba'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par rtog pa'i rigs dang bral zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The accomplishment of the sun means the supreme joy, the bodhicitta free from conceptualization.

original: gang zhig rnam par rtog pa med pa dang cha med pa de ni rab dang mchog go //
analyzed: gang zhig rnam par rtog pa med pa dang cha med pa de ni rab dang mchog go //
translated: What is free from conceptualization and partless is excellent and supreme.

original: rab mchog gi phyir phra mo /
analyzed: rab mchog gi phyir phra mo /
translated: Because of being excellent and supreme, it is subtle.

original: phra mo'i phyir gang yang min /
analyzed: phra mo'i phyir gang yang min /
translated: Because of being subtle, it is nothing at all.

original: gang yang ma yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi sku'o //
analyzed: gang yang ma yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi sku'o //
translated: Because of being nothing at all, it is the empty body.

original: stong pa nyid kyi sku'i phyir 'od rab bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi sku'i phyir 'od rab bo //
translated: Because of being the empty body, it is the light of light.

original: 'od rab kyi phyir zhi ba chen po'o //
analyzed: 'od rab kyi phyir zhi ba chen po'o //
translated: Because of being the light of light, it is great peace.

original: zhi ba chen po'i phyir kun la bzhugs so //
analyzed: zhi ba chen po'i phyir kun la bzhugs so //
translated: Because of being great peace, it abides in all.

original: dpal padma sh'i ka ra'i gzhung gis ji ltar nam mkha' kun la khyab pa de ltar 'od rab /
analyzed: dpal padma sh'i ka ra'i gzhung gis ji ltar nam mkha' kun la khyab pa de ltar 'od rab /
translated: Just as the sky pervades all, so does the light of light.

original: grags pa'i rang bzhin thams cad la bzhugs zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: grags pa'i rang bzhin thams cad la bzhugs zhes dgongs so //
translated: Abiding in all means abiding in all natures of fame.

original: de ni nyin mo la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni nyin mo la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin no //
translated: The day and so on are literal.

original: mtshams gnyis 'dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: mtshams gnyis 'dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: The two junctures are joined, and so on.

original: mtshams zhes bya ba ni 'pho ba /
analyzed: mtshams zhes bya ba ni 'pho ba /
translated: The two junctures are the two transferences.

original: gnyis bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs /
analyzed: gnyis bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs /
translated: The two are wisdom and means.

original: 'dus zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dus zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor ro //
translated: Joined means conjoined.

original: rdo rje dang / padma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab thabs gnyis su 'brel pas /
analyzed: rdo rje dang / padma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab thabs gnyis su 'brel pas /
translated: The vajra and lotus, sun and moon are the two wisdoms and means.

original: gang zhig kha sbyor byed pa de ni rdo rje dang padmar grags pa'i mtshan ma gnyis 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig kha sbyor byed pa de ni rdo rje dang padmar grags pa'i mtshan ma gnyis 'dus pa'o //
translated: That which is conjoined is the two signs known as the vajra and lotus.

original: yang na de dag las byung ba zla ba dang nyi ma'o //
analyzed: yang na de dag las byung ba zla ba dang nyi ma'o //
translated: Or else, the moon and sun arise from them.

original: zla ba'i sgras ni shu kra /
analyzed: zla ba'i sgras ni shu kra /
translated: The word moon is ≈õukra.

original: nyi ma'i sgras ni rakta'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i sgras ni rakta'o //
translated: The word sun is rakta.

original: lte ba gnyis kyi phrad pa la sogs zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka'o //
analyzed: lte ba gnyis kyi phrad pa la sogs zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka'o //
translated: The juncture of the two navels and so on is the two.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi mtshan ma gnyis ka la gang zhig snying po'i gnas de ni lte ba gnyis so //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs kyi mtshan ma gnyis ka la gang zhig snying po'i gnas de ni lte ba gnyis so //
translated: The place of the essence of the two signs of wisdom and means is the two navels.

original: phrad pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes dbang bskur nyams su myong ba'i skabs su bla ma'i man ngag las gsang ba'i rin po che 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: phrad pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes dbang bskur nyams su myong ba'i skabs su bla ma'i man ngag las gsang ba'i rin po che 'dus pa'o //
translated: The meeting is the secret jewel, the union of the two jewels, which is experienced in the consecration of the wisdomknowledge.

original: phra mor lta ba'i skad cig gis mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni nang gi lta ba grub ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phra mor lta ba'i skad cig gis mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni nang gi lta ba grub ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The instant of the view of the subtle means the accomplishment of the inner view.

original: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni gsang ba chen po rin po che rtse mo gnyis 'dus pa las /
analyzed: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni gsang ba chen po rin po che rtse mo gnyis 'dus pa las /
translated: By the text of Sri Indrabhuti, the two tips of the great secret jewel are united.

original: gang zhig shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gyis 'bras bu nyams su myong ba'i byang chub kyi sems thigs pa'i snang ba'i thigs pa de ni dogs gnyis kyi dbus su reg bya'i lta bas gzigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gyis 'bras bu nyams su myong ba'i byang chub kyi sems thigs pa'i snang ba'i thigs pa de ni dogs gnyis kyi dbus su reg bya'i lta bas gzigs pa nyid do //
translated: The drop of the light of the drop of the bodhicitta experienced in the result of the consecration of the wisdomknowledge is seen by the view of the tactile in the middle of the two doors.

original: @127b mtshams ni spros pa las 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig sngar bstan pa'i mtshams de ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can gang zhig 'og tu bshad pa de ni spros pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: @127b mtshams ni spros pa las 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig sngar bstan pa'i mtshams de ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can gang zhig 'og tu bshad pa de ni spros pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The boundary is beyond elaboration, and so forth. The boundary that was previously taught has the characteristic of elaboration, and that which is explained below is free from elaboration.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa dang bral ba dang mchog dang mchog las mchog nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa dang bral ba dang mchog dang mchog las mchog nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, the BhagavƒÅn has taught the freedom from aspects, the supreme, and the supreme of the supreme.

original: phrad pa gnyis kyi dbus gnas la sogs pa la /
analyzed: phrad pa gnyis kyi dbus gnas la sogs pa la /
translated: The middle between the two meetings, and so forth.

original: pra ha sti sta badzra au da ya'i gzhung gis kun rdzob dang gon dam pa gnyos su med pa'i shes rab /
analyzed: pra ha sti sta badzra au da ya'i gzhung gis kun rdzob dang gon dam pa gnyos su med pa'i shes rab /
translated: By the text of Prahasti·π£a and Vajrodayama, the wisdom of the nonduality of the conventional and the ultimate.

analyzed: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis ni dngos po dang dngos po ma yin pa'i phyogs gnyis spangs te /
translated: By the text of ≈örƒ´ Indrabh≈´ti, having abandoned the two extremes of entity and nonentity,

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi sgron ma tsam gang ngo //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byug ces bya ba ni 'khor ba snum pa //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gis bral lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
