original: de ni mtshams la sogs zhes bya ba'i sgra ji bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni mtshams la sogs zhes bya ba'i sgra ji bzhin no //
translated: The word border and so on is literal.

original: shar la sogs zhes bya ba la slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis ni lha dang mi nyid skye ba nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos sems can dmigs pa'i thugs rje mngon du gyur par mdzad pas /
analyzed: shar la sogs zhes bya ba la slob dpon sha ba ri'i gzhung gis ni lha dang mi nyid skye ba nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos sems can dmigs pa'i thugs rje mngon du gyur par mdzad pas /
translated: As for east and so on, according to the system of Master ≈öavari, the great Blessed Vajradhara, having manifested compassion that focuses on sentient beings, in order to take birth as a god or human,

translated: with the method of the great means of achievement and the means of achievement, draws sentient beings of the lower realms into his mouth with the hook of wisdom, and places them in the abode of great bliss in the form of the nectar of melted moon.

original: de'i skabs su /
analyzed: de'i skabs su /

analyzed: mdud pa'i rtse mo mchog gi gnas //

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

original: tsa na ka yi zur gzugs can //

translated: This is the treatise of the oral instruction of J√±ƒÅnapƒÅda.

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su byang chub sems kyi thig le'o //
translated: In the creation stage, it is the drop of bodhicitta.

analyzed: slob dpon gzhan ma'i gzhung gis de ni rdzogs par gleng /
translated: In the treatise of other masters, it is explained as complete.

original: de rang kho na shes par bya //
analyzed: de rang kho na shes par bya //

original: zhes pa la slob dpon do mbi pa'i gzhung gis ni /
analyzed: zhes pa la slob dpon do mbi pa'i gzhung gis ni /
translated: In the treatise of Master Do·πá·∏çubhis,

analyzed: gang gi dga' ba'i thig le de rang chad pa'i dga' ba'i thig le kha 'am sgo'o //
translated: the drop of joy is the drop of joy of one‚Äôs own section, the mouth or door.

original: yang na @128a * //
analyzed: yang na @128a * //
translated: Or else,üîΩüîΩ

original: lam zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it means the path.

original: kha ni gnyis pa yin zhes bya ba la chad pa'i dga' ba la yang kha chad pa'i spro ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: kha ni gnyis pa yin zhes bya ba la chad pa'i dga' ba la yang kha chad pa'i spro ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The second door is called mouth, which means that the path of the joy of the cut-off is also called the path of the delight of the cut-off.

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub snying po'i gzhung gis sgo gnyis pa rtag pa dang chad pa nges par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub snying po'i gzhung gis sgo gnyis pa rtag pa dang chad pa nges par gsungs so //
translated: The text of ƒÄrya NƒÅgƒÅrjunagarbha clearly states the two doors of permanence and annihilation.

original: dpal aindra bh'uti'i gzhung gis ni gang zhig tsa na ka'i rus pa'i rnam pa can byang chub sems kyi thig le de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mdud pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: dpal aindra bh'uti'i gzhung gis ni gang zhig tsa na ka'i rus pa'i rnam pa can byang chub sems kyi thig le de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mdud pa'i gnas so //
translated: The text of ≈örƒ´ Indrabh≈´ti states that the drop of bodhicitta, which has the form of a mustard seed, is the place of the knot of the ma·πá·∏çala cakra.

original: kha zhes bya ba ni nang gi lha mo'i sgo /
analyzed: kha zhes bya ba ni nang gi lha mo'i sgo /
translated: The so-called mouth is the door of the inner goddess.

original: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyis sgo /
analyzed: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyis sgo /
translated: The so-called second is the door of the outer goddess.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs /
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs /
translated: That is the side of the stage of generation.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni gang zhig tsa na ka'i rus pa'i gzugs can byang chub kyi sems de ni mchog gi dga' ba 'byung ba /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni gang zhig tsa na ka'i rus pa'i gzugs can byang chub kyi sems de ni mchog gi dga' ba 'byung ba /
translated: The stage of completion is the arising of supreme joy from the bodhicitta that has the form of a mustard seed.

original: de rang kha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin po che'i sgo /
analyzed: de rang kha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin po che'i sgo /
translated: That is called one's own mouth, which is the door of the vajra jewel.

original: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni gsang ba padma lte ba'i sgo /
analyzed: gnyis pa zhes bya ba ni gsang ba padma lte ba'i sgo /
translated: The second is the door of the secret lotus center.

original: pra ha sti sta badzra au da ya'i gzhung gis shar ba zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi byang chub kyi sems kun snang /
analyzed: pra ha sti sta badzra au da ya'i gzhung gis shar ba zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi byang chub kyi sems kun snang /
translated: The arising of the bodhicitta of the relative and ultimate by the text of Prahaste Vajra Udaya is the all-illuminating.

original: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis shar ba ni mchog gi dga' ba /
analyzed: dpal aindra bh'u ti'i gzhung gis shar ba ni mchog gi dga' ba /
translated: The arising by the text of Sri Indrabhuti is supreme joy.

original: aom dha'i sgras ni mtshan mo'i 'du shes kyi ngo bo can chad pa'i dga' ba /
analyzed: aom dha'i sgras ni mtshan mo'i 'du shes kyi ngo bo can chad pa'i dga' ba /
translated: The syllable om is the joy of cessation, which is the nature of the perception of night.

original: bdag po'i sgras ni zla ba'i 'du shes kyi ngo bo can /
analyzed: bdag po'i sgras ni zla ba'i 'du shes kyi ngo bo can /
translated: The syllable sva is the joy of the nature of the perception of the moon.

original: mtshan mo gyen du 'gro ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba /
analyzed: mtshan mo gyen du 'gro ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba /
translated: The upward movement of night is natural joy.

original: mtshan mo thig le mnyam par grags //
analyzed: mtshan mo thig le mnyam par grags //
translated: Night is renowned as the equal of the bindu.

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin can byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin can byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i rgyal po'o //

analyzed: mar ni byang chub kyi sems so //
